title: New Releases and More for August 7, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty and Jenn discuss Temper, If You Leave Me, The Third Hotel, and more great books.
This episode was sponsored by Book Riot Insiders and Rothy’s.
And don’t forget to enter to win 16 books from the Recommended podcast!
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or iTunes and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
For a complete list of books discussed in this episode, visit our website.

Books discussed on the show:
Our House by Louise Candlish
Temper by Nicky Drayden
If You Leave Me by Crystal Hana Kim
The Court Dancer by Kyung-Sook Shin
The Third Hotel by Laura van den Berg
Girls Resist!: A Guide to Activism, Leadership, and Starting a Revolution by Kaelyn Rich and Giulia Sagramola
Rogue Protocol: The Murderbot Diaries by Martha Wells
Heretics Anonymous by Katie Henry

What we’re reading:
Tempests and Slaughter by Tamora Pierce
Trail of Lightning by Rebecca Roanhorse
We Cast a Shadow by Maurice Carlos Ruffin
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
